name: Reakt
description:
"REAKT" TO OBJECTS

React to the objects moving towards you! Move through the teleporters to increase your score. Becareful though, you only have 10 health!

Use KEYBOARD ARROW KEYS or WASD Goal: React to all incoming objects and obtain a highscore by using the teleporters This game was made in 72 hours for the game jam Minijam100 Overload with the limitation "Chaos is Everything". Dev time: ~25 hours

All assets are original made by me.
